dict.acceptation: 讨厌的东西（人，行为）麻烦事；非法妨害，损害；麻烦事；

sent.orig: What we call progress is the exchange of one nuisance for another nuisance.
sent.trans: 我们所谓的进步，无非是以一麻烦换上另一麻烦罢了。

sent.orig: "What a nuisance! What a nuisance!'said Li in delight.
sent.trans: 梅亭欢喜得直说：“讨厌，讨厌！

sent.orig: That man's a general nuisance, ie to most people at most times.

sent.trans: 他的确是个讨厌的家伙。
